methods.name: intFromByteArray
javadoc: Read 4 bytes from the given array in little-endian format and return them as an int

methods.name: intFromNetworkByteArray
javadoc: Read 4 bytes from the given array in big-endian format and return them as an int

methods.name: stringFromByteArray
javadoc: Read a null-terminated string from the given byte array

methods.name: toHexString
javadoc: Returns a String representation of the byte in hexadecimal format
